testcase.name: searchByCookingTime1

failure.message:
Expected the output to contain the string Pancake dough, cooking time: 15. When the contents of the file are: Pancake dough 15 milk
Meatballs 10 ground meat
Test the program with the commands: test-ef7264 find cooking time 15 stop .

testcase.failure:
java.lang.AssertionError: Expected the output to contain the string Pancake dough, cooking time: 15. When the contents of the file are: Pancake dough 15 milk
